org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.api

Class StatisticValue<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.api.StatisticValue<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the return type of the statistic value
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Mergeable, Persistable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractBoundingBoxValue, AbstractTimeRangeValue, BloomFilterStatistic.BloomFilterValue, CountMinSketchStatistic.CountMinSketchValue, CountStatistic.CountValue, DifferingVisibilityCountStatistic.DifferingVisibilityCountValue, DuplicateEntryCountStatistic.DuplicateEntryCountValue, FieldVisibilityCountStatistic.FieldVisibilityCountValue, FixedBinNumericHistogramStatistic.FixedBinNumericHistogramValue, HyperLogLogStatistic.HyperLogLogPlusValue, IndexMetaDataSetStatistic.IndexMetaDataSetValue, MaxDuplicatesStatistic.MaxDuplicatesValue, NumericHistogramStatistic.NumericHistogramValue, NumericMeanStatistic.NumericMeanValue, NumericRangeStatistic.NumericRangeValue, NumericStatsStatistic.NumericStatsValue, PartitionsStatistic.PartitionsValue, RasterFootprintStatistic.RasterFootprintValue, RasterHistogramStatistic.RasterHistogramValue, RasterOverviewStatistic.RasterOverviewValue, RowRangeHistogramStatistic.RowRangeHistogramValue, WordCountStatistic.WordCountValue

    public abstract class StatisticValue<R>
extends Object
implements Mergeable
    Base class for values of a statistic. This class is responsible for the updates, serialization, and merging of statistic values.

    • Method Detail

      • getStatistic

        public Statistic<?> getStatistic()
        Get the parent statistic. Note, this may be null in cases of server-side statistic merging.
        Returns:
        the parent statistic

      • setBin

        public void setBin(ByteArray bin)
        Sets the bin for this value. Only used if the underlying statistic uses a binning strategy.
        Parameters:
        bin - the bin for this value

      • getBin

        public ByteArray getBin()
        Gets the bin for this value. If the underlying statistic does not use a binning strategy, an empty byte array will be returned.
        Returns:
        the bin for this value

      • merge

        public abstract void merge(Mergeable merge)
        Merge another statistic value into this one. IMPORTANT: This function cannot guarantee that the Statistic will be available. Any variables needed from the statistic for merging must be serialized with the value.
        Specified by:
        merge in interface Mergeable

      • getValue

        public abstract R getValue()
        Get the raw value of the statistic value.
        Returns:
        the raw value
